CVXPY
Maximize
  Sum(x, None, False)
Subject To
 13: reshape(x, (4, 1), F) <= [[1.00]
 [1.00]
 [1.00]
 [1.00]]
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: -1 x_0 -1 x_1 -1 x_2 -1 x_3
Subject to
 c1: +1 x_0 <= +1
 c2: +1 x_1 <= +1
 c3: +1 x_2 <= +1
 c4: +1 x_3 <= +1
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 x_2 free
 x_3 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Maximize
 Obj: +1 x_0 +1 x_1 +1 x_2 +1 x_3
Subject to
 13_0_0: +1 x_0 <= +1
 13_1_0: +1 x_1 <= +1
 13_2_0: +1 x_2 <= +1
 13_3_0: +1 x_3 <= +1
Bounds
 x_0 free
 x_1 free
 x_2 free
 x_3 free
End
